data.taskTitle: Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
data.approach: Update statusline.sh (bd list -> jt list, bd show -> jt show, bd dep -> jt dep), get-agent-task.sh (bd list -> jt list), rename bd-epic-child -> jt-epic-child, update bd-check-review/bd-review-rules/bd-review-rules-loader/bd-set-review-override to use jt and .jat/ paths, simplify backup/rollback for .jat/tasks.db

data.taskTitle: Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
data.approach: Update statusline.sh (already partially done - uses jt), get-agent-task.sh (already partially done - uses jt), update review scripts to use jt instead of bd, simplify backup/rollback for .jat/tasks.db, ensure jt-epic-child is correct

data.taskTitle: Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
summary: Updated statusline.sh comments (bd -> jt)
Updated get-agent-task.sh (already used jt, verified clean)
Updated bd-check-review: bd show/list -> jt show/list, bd config -> .jat/review-rules.json
Updated bd-review-rules: bd config get/set -> direct .jat/review-rules.json manipulation via jq
Updated bd-review-rules-loader: .beads/ -> .jat/, removed bd config sync functions
Updated bd-set-review-override: bd show/update -> jt show/update, .beads/ -> .jat/
Simplified backup-beads.sh: .beads/beads.db -> .jat/tasks.db, removed Beads-specific complexity
Simplified rollback-beads.sh: .beads/beads.db -> .jat/tasks.db, simplified restore logic
Verified jt-epic-child already uses jt (correct)
reviewFocus: bd-review-rules now stores config in .jat/review-rules.json instead of bd config
backup/rollback scripts use tasks table instead of issues table

data.taskTitle: Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt
summary: Migrated all bd CLI calls to jt in 18 files
Created new jt-* tools (jt-epic-child, jt-check-review, jt-review-rules, jt-review-rules-loader, jt-set-review-override)
Simplified backup-tasks.sh and rollback-tasks.sh for .jat/tasks.db
Redesigned review tools to use .jat/review-rules.json directly (no bd config)
Updated statusline, jat-step, jat-complete-bundle, jat-doctor, jat-demo, setup-repos, test-statusline
Fixed ingest taskCreator.js for jt output format differences

data.taskTitle: Migrate shell scripts and hooks from bd to jt

summary: Migrated shell scripts from 'bd' to 'jt' command prefix across multiple scripts
Updated 4 shell callsites to use new 'jt' commands instead of 'bd'
Renamed and updated helper scripts with new .jat/ path references
Simplified backup and rollback scripts for task database management

suggestedTasks.title: Create comprehensive script migration documentation
suggestedTasks.description: Document the migration process from 'bd' to 'jt' commands. Create a detailed guide explaining the changes made, new command structures, and potential impact on existing workflows. Include a mapping of old 'bd' commands to new 'jt' commands for reference.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure clear understanding of command migration for team members

suggestedTasks.title: Audit remaining scripts for potential bd/jt command references
suggestedTasks.description: Perform a comprehensive search across the entire codebase to identify any remaining 'bd' command references that might have been missed during this migration. Create a script or process to systematically replace these references and ensure complete migration.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure complete migration and prevent potential future inconsistencies

gotchas: Careful replacement of command references to avoid breaking existing scripts
Ensure path updates are consistent across multiple files

documentationNeeds: Update internal wiki with command changes
